scripts.build: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS="--max-old-space-size=8192 --no-warnings" NEXT_TELEMETRY_DISABLED=1 next build --webpack && npm run copy-public
scripts.build:local: cross-env NODE_ENV=production NODE_OPTIONS="--max-old-space-size=8192 --no-warnings" NEXT_TELEMETRY_DISABLED=1 API_URL=http://localhost:8084 NEXT_PUBLIC_API_URL=http://localhost:8084 next build --webpack && npm run copy-public
scripts.build:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=production NODE_OPTIONS="--max-old-space-size=8192 --no-warnings" NEXT_TELEMETRY_DISABLED=1 API_URL=http://192.168.0.101:8084 NEXT_PUBLIC_API_URL=http://192.168.0.101:8084 next build --webpack && npm run copy-public
scripts.build:staging: cross-env NODE_ENV=production NODE_OPTIONS="--max-old-space-size=8192 --no-warnings" NEXT_TELEMETRY_DISABLED=1 API_URL=http://www.motclub.co.kr NEXT_PUBLIC_API_URL=http://www.motclub.co.kr next build --webpack && npm run copy-public
scripts.build:prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production NODE_OPTIONS="--max-old-space-size=8192 --no-warnings" NEXT_TELEMETRY_DISABLED=1 API_URL=http://www.motclub.co.kr NEXT_PUBLIC_API_URL=http://www.motclub.co.kr next build --webpack && npm run copy-public
scripts.copy-public: powershell -Command "$distDir = if ($env:NODE_ENV -eq 'production') { 'dist' } else { '.next' }; $standaloneDir = Join-Path $distDir 'standalone'; if ((Test-Path 'public') -and (Test-Path $standaloneDir)) { Copy-Item -Path 'public' -Destination (Join-Path $standaloneDir 'public') -Recurse -Force; Write-Host 'public 폴더 복사 완료: $standaloneDir\public' }"
